articles.title: Dark season 3 trailer reveals release date, time travel in ‘a new world’ - Polygon
articles.description: The first trailer for Netflix’s third and final cycle of Dark teases how Netflix’s twist-filled time-travel show will end when it’s released on June 26. Let us explain what you’re seeing here.
articles.content: The final season will be released on June 26
